title: Muramana on Nasus Q
body: Has anyone tried the new new muramana on Nasus yet? Does it go boom?

replies.body:
Its not really worth.  Nasus does better with full tank items then damage, since most of your damage comes from how well you stack your q.

HOWEVER!  That being said, Nasus with {{item:3004}} {{item:3508}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3072}} {{item:1320}} hits like a truck.  That is if you dont die in 3 seconds.  Cuz crit nasus with max cdr is fun.

'oom' with a MuraMANA...

I see what you did there.
its better to get trinity force and steraks on nasus. would hurt a lot more.
